attributes.action: request HM the Queen to dissolve Parliament and to call an immediate General Election, as our MPs no longer have any authority to represent us nor make laws in our name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The continuing revelations in the Daily and Sunday Telegraph have brought Parliament's reputation to its knees, and such is the public's hostility towards many of the MPs so far named that Parliament as a body has lost its moral authority. It is imperative to restore the public's confidence in Parliament, and a General Election with new candidates in ceetain seats would go a long way to address that.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
